scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: npx sentry-cli --url https://sentry.uuid.rocks sourcemaps upload ./dist/ --strip-prefix './dist/../' --release $(scripts/version.sh) --org sentry --project countify-api
scripts.sentry:commits: npx sentry-cli --url https://sentry.uuid.rocks releases set-commits $(scripts/version.sh) --auto --org sentry --project countify-api
scripts.sentry:finalize: npx sentry-cli --url https://sentry.uuid.rocks releases finalize $(scripts/version.sh) --org sentry --project countify-api
